text: Some time later, war broke out with the Philistines at Gezer. At that time Sibbecai the Hushathite killed Sippai,20:4 Sippai is a variant of Saph; see 2 Samuel 21:18. a descendant of the Rephaim,20:4 Or the giants; see also descendants of Rapha in verses 6 and 8. and the Philistines were subdued.
